text: "This is something in a really sad, distraught world that everybody can agree on: Who wants to see children hurt?" she says. "This is something that has nothing to do with politics or where you live. It's doing the right thing for kids. … How can that not be a good thing? I think that with Cathy dying so young, she could have had such an impact on our lives — but she's having a bigger one now. And maybe that was the way it was supposed to be. My life is so rich because of hers."
title: Meet the 'grandma Nancy Drews' behind 'The Keepers,' Netflix's newest true-crime series
